Posts.Content: tracybuggie wrote: Hi, my name is Tracy and 43 years old with double masectomy and in need of donated prostheses. I can not afford them, Medical bills have left our family almost on the street. We have six kids and one in college now. I really want to have somewhat normal appearance when I go out in public. I would be very greatful for any help anyone can offer. I was a size B-C. I hate to bed for help, but I dont know what else to do, but ask for a donation. Tracy Shively 27515 Ivy Court Magnolia, Texas 77354 Again thanks for all that can help me. I dont have any other avenues. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Please Help. Need Prostheses Donated tracybuggie GramE
